title: FoodPulse: Restaurant Trend Tracker
description: FoodPulse is a web and mobile application designed to track restaurant trends and aggregate user reviews in real-time.
introduction: In a fast-paced dining world, FoodPulse helps users discover new restaurants, track culinary trends, and make informed decisions based on aggregated reviews.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The idea for FoodPulse arose from the need for a platform that provides real-time insights into restaurant trends and comprehensive review aggregation. Existing solutions often lacked timely updates and depth in user feedback. To address this, we utilized web scraping and APIs to gather data from various sources, ensuring up-to-the-minute information.

sections.title: Development
sections.body: We chose React Native for the frontend to ensure cross-platform compatibility and a seamless user experience. For the backend, Node.js was selected for its scalability and efficiency in handling large datasets. Challenges included managing high volumes of data and ensuring optimal performance, which we overcame by optimizing our database schema and implementing caching mechanisms.

sections.title: User Feedback
sections.body: Post-launch, user feedback highlighted the need for more personalized features and enhanced search functionality. Implementing these without compromising performance was a challenge. We addressed this by conducting A/B testing and rolling out iterative updates to refine the user experience.

sections.title: Current Features
sections.body: FoodPulse now offers real-time trend tracking, comprehensive review aggregation, personalized recommendations, and social sharing options. We incorporated Natural Language Processing (NLP) for sentiment analysis of reviews and integrated social media APIs to facilitate easy sharing of favorite restaurants.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Looking ahead, we plan to expand FoodPulse to more cities and enhance our recommendation algorithm using AI. Additionally, we aim to introduce a booking feature directly through the app. Challenges include scaling our infrastructure and ensuring data privacy, which we will tackle by leveraging cloud infrastructure and adhering to strict data regulations.
